properties.headline: Wind Advisory issued January 10 at 1:39PM MST until January 11 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Billings MT
properties.description:
* WHAT...Southwest winds gusting up to 65 mph.

* WHERE...Livingston Area and Beartooth Foothills.

* WHEN...Until 11 AM MST Saturday. Strongest winds tonight.

* DANGEROUS CROSSWINDS...The high winds will cause very difficult
travel for high profile vehicles and those pulling trailers.

* BLOWING SNOW...The high winds will cause areas of blowing snow
which may limit visibility to a half mile or less at times.
Drifting and slick roads are also possible, causing significant
travel difficulty in the Livingston vicinity on I-90.
properties.instruction:
Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high
profile vehicle. Check the latest road reports before traveling
through the area as road detours or closures are possible.

Additional graphics for this hazard can be found at
http://www.weather.gov/billings

NWSheadline: WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM MST SATURDAY
